title.rendered: PyrAmes Awarded SBIR Phase I Grant from USAF

content.rendered: PyrAmes is pleased to announce it has been awarded a Phase I grant from the United States Air Force (USAF) AFWERX program. Pyrames was part of a select group of companies asked to undertake a feasibility study to determine product viability within the Department of Defense (DoD). AFWERX is a program within the USAF and was formed in 2017 as a vehicle to fuel innovation within the private sector. The ultimate goal of the program is to address unmet needs and enhance the effectiveness of the Air Force.
